statements: SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100

SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_reminder IS NOT NULL;

SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_message, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND payment_frequency = 'weekly'
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01' AND is_completed = FALSE ORDER BY reminder_date ASC
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE associated_task LIKE '%important%'

SELECT payment_name, amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY due_date;

SELECT id, payment_name, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE status = 'in progress';

SELECT payment_amount, payment_frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY next_payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Incomplete' AND task_due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_title, reminder_due_date FROM reminders WHERE reminder_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY reminder_due_date ASC;

SELECT rp.payment_id, rp.amount, rt.task_name, r.reminder_title FROM recurring_payments rp JOIN tasks_reminder_mapping trm ON rp.payment_id = trm.task_id JOIN scheduled_tasks rt ON trm.task_id = rt.task_id JOIN reminders r ON trm.reminder_id = r.reminder_id WHERE rp.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND r.reminder_due_date > '2022-02-01';
